alert.note: Alert for Sebastian (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 10 at 6:44AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Sebastian, Haskell, southern McIntosh, Sequoyah, northern Latimer, southwestern Adair, northern Le Flore, central Pittsburg and southeastern Muskogee Counties through 730 AM CDT... At 644 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 3 miles northeast of Marble City to 5 miles northwest of Keota to 5 miles southwest of Hanna. Movement was southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations in or near the path include... Fort Smith... Mcalester... Sallisaw... Poteau... Wilburton... Eufaula... Stigler... Pocola... Muldrow... Roland... Spiro... Hartshorne... Krebs... Arkoma... Vian... Panama... Quinton... Porum... Savanna... Bonanza... This includes the following highways, Interstate 40 in Oklahoma between mile markers 293 and 328. Interstate 540 between mile markers 5 and 14. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 AM CDT for southeastern, northeastern and east central Oklahoma.
